intension: Create a promotional flyer for a restaurant offering delicious and savory food with premium quality ingredients. The flyer highlights a special discount of 15% and encourages customers to order online. Contact number: +123456789
globalcaption: The image features a large, appetizing piece of meat, possibly a steak or a roast, placed on a dining table. The meat is accompanied by a variety of vegetables, including several carrots and potatoes. The carrots are scattered around the meat, with some closer to the top and others near the bottom of the image. The potatoes are positioned around the meat as well, with some near the top and others near the bottom. The overall scene is a delightful display of a delicious meal.
keywords: food, meat, beef, steak, dinner, meal, restaurant, grilled, raw, delicious, roasted, slice, premium, quality, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a large, pink background that covers the entire frame. The pink color is a dominant feature, giving the scene a vibrant and lively appearance

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a close-up view of a large piece of meat, possibly a steak, placed on a black cutting board. The meat is accompanied by a few vegetables, including a carrot and a potato, which are arranged around the meat. The carrot is positioned to the right of the meat, while the potato is located to the left. The combination of the meat and vegetables creates an appetizing and visually appealing presentation
